content:
[if]
    [module]
        `[dead tower]`
        `[dungeon]`
        `[tournament dungeon]`
        `[war room]`
        `[blood system]`
    [/module]
    [change status]
        `hp`
        `>`
        `%` 0
        `end`
    [time]
        500 1   500
[/if]
 
[then]
    [target]
        `myself`    -1
    [probability]
        100
    [add stat at once]
        `skill cool time`
        `%` -100
[/then]
